1.         CAN YOU DESCRIBE ARMOR ?
To be honest, the armour varies somewha=
t by period.  Is there a specific type of armour that you=92re looking for =
a description of?

2.   WHY WAS THE SWORD THE SAMURAI'S MOST PRIZED MOST PO=
SSESSUIN ?
Again this varies by period. At times only the samurai class wer=
e permitted to carry a katana so it was a status symbol.  Some were very ex=
pensive or family hairlooms.  Depending on the period, samurai could have b=
een engaged in combat or could have been simply bureaucrats.  So the katana=
=92s significance really depends.

3. WHAT WERE THE 2 SWORDS THAT THE SAMUR=
AI CARRIED  ?
The 2 swords together are called daisho.  The shorter is the =
wakizashi, the longer is the katana.

4.WHAT WERE THE 2 SWORDS USED FOR ?
T=
he wakizashi was a companion sword. It had a few uses but was typically the=
 sword worn indoors since it=92s shorter.  The longer katana was the main d=
ueling/battle sword

7. WHAT IS BUSHIDO ?
Bushido roughly translated means =
=91way of the warrior=92.  It=92s essentially a code of conduct where follo=
wers adhered to principles of rectitude, loyalty, courage, respect, benevol=
ence, honesty & honour.
 
I=92m responding from work so I apologize for the=
 lack of detail.  Pretty much all of the answers to your questions can be f=
ound in greater detail through a google search.
 
Cheers!
